@title:Pulse Rifles

// (Chambered Compensator, Fluted Barrel, Smallbore, Corkscrew Rifling, Polygonal Rifling), Steady Rounds, (Surplus, Feeding Frenzy), Osmosis

description:Weapons roundup as at S15 Festival of the Lost - additional personal rolls

// Gridskipper (PvE first choice roll)
// Recommended barrels not mentioned in Podcast 213 (Extended Barrel, Hammer-forged Rifling, Smallbore, Corkscrew Rifling), Combat Mags (High-Calibre Rounds, Armor-Piercing Rounds), Heating up, Recommended Trait 2 from Podcast 213 (Thresh, Frenzy, Adrenaline Junkie)
//notes:Adamsdown_Boy PvE first choice roll. Recommended MW: Stability or Reload Speed on personal choice.
dimwishlist:item=1621558458&perks=1467527085,1968497646,1570042021,2726471870

dimwishlist:item=1621558458&perks=1482024992,1968497646,1570042021,2726471870
